BR.name: Disney Princess: My Fairytale Adventure
BR.description: Em “Disney Princess: My Fairytale Adventure”, os jogadores vão entrar no reino clássico das Princesas Disney: Cinderela, Rapunzel, Ariel, Bela e Tiana, onde será preciso usar a varinha mágica para ajudar a suas princesas favoritas. Os jogadores podem assumir o papel de aprendiz da Fada Madrinha e explorar cada um dos mundos das Princesas. Além disso, os jogadores vão poder interagir com personagens conhecidos da Disney, como Lumiere, Pascal, Linguado, Tatá e outros também amados pelas fãs que vão guiá-las por missões e ajudá-las a progredir no jogo.

CA.name: Disney Princess: My Fairytale Adventure
CA.description: In “Disney Princess: My Fairytale Adventure,” players will enter the enchanting worlds of Cinderella, Rapunzel, Ariel, Belle and Tiana, and use their magic wand to help undo a spell that’s been cast over the kingdoms. Fans of all ages will be able to play as an apprentice to the Fairy Godmother and explore each of the Princess worlds. They’ll be able to interact with familiar characters, such as Lumiere, Pascal, Flounder, Gus and other fan favorites who will help guide them through missions and progress though the game.

MX.name: Disney Princess: My Fairytale Adventure
MX.description: En Disney Princesas: Reinos Mágicos, los jugadores podrán explorar los reinos encantados de las clásicas princesas de Disney: La Cenicienta, Rapunzel, Ariel, Bella y Tiana; y salvar a sus princesas favoritas esgrimiendo una varita mágica. Tendrán la posibilidad de adoptar el rol de un aprendiz del Hada Madrina y explorar los reinos encantados de las clásicas princesas de Disney. Cada mundo permitirá a los jugadores interactuar con los conocidos personajes de Disney, como Lumiere, Pascal, Flounder, Gus y otros favoritos de los fans, quienes servirán de guía a través de diferentes misiones y los ayudarán a progresar durante el juego.

US.name: Disney Princess: My Fairytale Adventure
US.description: In “Disney Princess: My Fairytale Adventure,” players will enter the enchanting worlds of Cinderella, Rapunzel, Ariel, Belle and Tiana, and use their magic wand to help undo a spell that’s been cast over the kingdoms. Fans of all ages will be able to play as an apprentice to the Fairy Godmother and explore each of the Princess worlds. They’ll be able to interact with familiar characters, such as Lumiere, Pascal, Flounder, Gus and other fan favorites who will help guide them through missions and progress though the game.
